title: Send trending "Show HN" to email
author: Jan Oberhauser
readme:
1. Triggers every day at 1pm
  2. Gets the current content from Hacker News
  3. Gets all the different submission items
  4. Extracts the rank, title and url
  5. Checks if it is a "Show HN" submission
  6. Combines the items into a simple email text
  7. Sends an email with the email text
readme_zh:
1. 每天下午1点自动触发  
2. 从Hacker News获取最新内容  
3. 提取所有不同的提交条目  
4. 解析排名、标题和网址  
5. 检查是否为"Show HN"类提交  
6. 将条目整合为简易邮件文本  
7. 发送包含该文本的电子邮件
title_zh: 将热门的“Show HN”发送至邮箱
